snippet: Secretary General Ban Ki-moon ordered an audit of the organization’s financial dealings with two obscure foundations implicated in an indictment this week.
abstract: United Nations Secretary General Ban Ki-moon orders inquiry into organization's finances, amid bribery investigation involving two foundations with UN ties.
lead_paragraph: Secretary General Ban Ki-moon ordered an audit of the organization’s financial dealings with two obscure foundations implicated in an indictment this week.

headline.main: U.N. Leader Orders Audit of Transactions
headline.print_headline: U.N. Leader Orders Audit of Transactions
